## v1.1.0 - 2024-08-07

### ğŸš€ Features

## v1.0.7 - 2024-03-02

### ğŸš€ Features
- Added an ID to the custom colorscheme to prevent the IDE from throwing exceptions.

- Added the Ascii Oxocarbon logo used in the original neovim config to the background of an empty frame.
